column4: "@mattxiv Billionaires don't cause our problems: government does: 1) Wealth isn't a finite resource, so it can't be hoarded. 1.5) We print $$ daily.  2) 99% of billionaire wealth is stocks, NOT cash. https://t.co/Sz4y60GwhD  3) Top 1% pay 45.8% of taxes: https://t.co/s1Fw632D3P #TaxTheRich"
"⚖️ Legal Loopholes: Billionaires exploit tax havens and legal tricks to avoid paying their fair share. The working class carries the burden while the rich hoard wealth. #TaxTheRich #FairEconomy"
